thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: Intesa Sanpaolo not in talks with anyone for wealth management tie-up - CEO

title: Intesa Sanpaolo not in talks with anyone for wealth management tie-up - CEO
text:
April 27, 2018 / 3:27 PM / in 17 minutes Intesa Sanpaolo not in talks with anyone for wealth management tie-up: CEO Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
MILAN (Reuters) - Intesa Sanpaolo ( ISP.MI ) is not in talks with anyone about a tie-up in wealth management as overly high multiples make it impossible to create value through a deal, Chief Executive Carlo Messina said on Friday.
The Italian lender has previously said it wanted to strongly grow its non-life insurance business and would consider partnering with a global player in asset management. Reporting by Gianluca Semeraro, writing by Agnieszka Flak, editing by Francesca Landini
